$schema.description: A field for the [JSON schema](https://json-schema.org/) specification

outDir.description: Path to the output directory. (relative to config file directory)

publicDir.description: Path to the output directory. (relative to config file directory)

poweredBy.description: Whether to show "Powered by linkz" footer (default: true)

favicon.description: URL or path to the favicon. (Note: path would be relative to `publicDir`)

profilePicture.description: URL or path to the profile picture. (Note: path would be relative to `publicDir`)

links.description: A list of links associated with the user.

href.description: URL of the link or path

external.description: If `true`, the link will open in new window. (default: false)
